hr.fer.zemris.java.graphics.raster

Class BWRasterMem

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.graphics.raster.BWRasterMem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BWRaster

    public class BWRasterMem
extends java.lang.Object
implements BWRaster
    The class BWRasterMem is an implementation of this interface which keeps all of its data in computer memory. It uses boolean array to store data. On creation of new objects of this class all pixels will be initially turned off. This class provides a single public constructor which accepts raster width and raster height; both must be at least 1.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Stjepan

      • turnOn

        public void turnOn(int x,
                   int y)
        Description copied from interface: BWRaster
        Turns pixel on at the specified location. The working of turnOn method is closely controlled with flipping mode of raster. If flipping mode of raster is disabled, then the call of the turnOn method turns on the pixel at specified location (again, if location is valid). However, if flipping mode is enabled, then the call of the turnOn method flips the pixel at the specified location (if it was turned on, it will be turned off, and if it was turned off, it will be turned on).
        Specified by:
        turnOn in interface BWRaster
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        See Also:
        for information about coordinate system

      • turnOff

      • changeFlip

        public void changeFlip()
